doc:
Mitchell Ryan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mitchell_Ryan 0 Mitchell Ryan (born January 11, 1928) is an American film, television, and stage actor, who in his six decades of television is known for playing Burke Devlin in the 1960s gothic soap opera Dark Shadows, and later for his co-starring role as Thomas Gibson's father Edward Montgomery on Dharma Greg. He also played the villainous General Peter McAllister in the 1987 buddy cop action film, Lethal Weapon. Mitchell_Ryan ( born January_11_,_1928 ) is an_American_film , television , and stage_actor , who in his_six_decades of television is_known for playing Burke_Devlin in the_1960s_gothic_soap_opera_Dark_Shadows , and later for his_co-starring_role as Thomas_Gibson 's_father_Edward_Montgomery on Dharma_ . He also played the_villainous_General_Peter_McAllister in the_1987_buddy_cop_action_film , Lethal_Weapon .
